semantic_blueprint_framework.description: The six-section methodology optimized for Gemini 3 Pro Image's reasoning capabilities

subject.purpose: Define identity and materiality with physics-based surface properties
required_elements: Materiality physics (MadeOutOf - surface textures, light interaction)
subject.example: Subject: A stoic elderly mechanic. Materiality: Skin texture weathered with visible pores and grease stains. Clothing is heavy denim canvas, frayed at seams. Pose: Leaning forward inspecting a gear, muscles tense.
subject.common_failures: Generic descriptions like 'a robot' without material specification lead to plastic AI sheen

action.purpose: Specify kinematics and causality to ground motion in physics
action.example: Action: Vaulting over concrete barrier. Kinematics: Body fully extended, muscles tensed. Causality: Debris displaced by trailing foot impact, dust hanging in air along trajectory.
action.common_failures: Simple verbs without causality result in static poses rather than dynamic motion

composition.purpose: Define virtual cinematography with optical physics
required_elements: Virtual camera type (Arri Alexa, RED, etc.)
Lens focal length (35mm wide, 85mm portrait, macro, etc.)
Framing and angle (rule of thirds, Dutch angle, etc.)
composition.example: Camera: Virtual Arri Alexa. Lens: 50mm Prime. Aperture: f/2.8. Framing: Dutch angle, rule of thirds, subject in right quadrant. Aspect Ratio: 2.39:1 (Cinematic Anamorphic).

lens_selection_guide.14mm-24mm_ultra_wide: Architecture, landscapes - expansive with distorted edges
lens_selection_guide.35mm_wide: Street photography, environmental portraits - contextual storytelling
lens_selection_guide.50mm_standard: Natural vision, product shots - human eye view

location.purpose: Leverage grounding and world knowledge for factual accuracy
required_elements: Atmospheric conditions (fog, smoke, sterile, humid, etc.)
location.example: Location: A subway station in 1980s New York City. Grounding: Accurately reflect graffiti style and subway car design of the era. Atmosphere: Gritty, humid, subterranean haze.
location.grounding_power: Specific names trigger Google Search integration - 'coffee shop in Shibuya, Tokyo' generates accurate signage, architecture, and regional details

background.purpose: Control global illumination and lighting physics
required_elements: Lighting type (hard vs soft, natural vs artificial)
Color temperature (warm tungsten vs cool fluorescent)
background.example: Lighting: Golden hour backlighting. Source: Low sun angle creates long shadows. Tone: Warm amber hues interacting with cool ambient skylight. Background out of focus and darker than subject.

lighting_physics_guide.golden_hour: Long shadows, warm orange - nostalgic, romantic, peaceful
lighting_physics_guide.blue_hour: Low contrast, deep blue - melancholic, serene, cinematic
lighting_physics_guide.hard_flash: Sharp shadows, high contrast - gritty, paparazzi, raw, energetic
lighting_physics_guide.rembrandt: Triangular highlight on cheek - dramatic, classic, moody
lighting_physics_guide.diffused_softbox: No hard shadows, even illumination - professional, commercial, clean

style.purpose: Aesthetic anchor with specific media and rendering references
required_elements: Medium simulation (film stock, render engine, painting technique)
style.example: Style: Neo-Noir Cyberpunk. Reference: Blade Runner aesthetics. Medium: Digital Photography, high ISO grain. Negative: No 3D render, no cartoon, no illustration.

medium_simulations.kodak_portra_400: Film grain, specific color science, analog warmth
medium_simulations.watercolor: Soft edges, color bleeding, translucent layers

concept_bleeding_prevention.problem: Attributes of one object leak into adjacent objects (red dress + blue umbrella = purple dress)
concept_bleeding_prevention.solution: Variable isolation through structured data or explicit grammatical separation
concept_bleeding_prevention.natural_language_approach: Use contrasting sentences: 'The woman wears a blue suit. In contrast, the wall behind her is red.'
concept_bleeding_prevention.json_approach: Separate objects into distinct bracketed structures to physically isolate tokens
